page.title: 15Childrens Games near Gt.Alne
page.content: We play games such as tig,skipping, hopscotch,conkers,cricket,football and marbles.Marbles is by far the most popular game in the summer.To play it one person throws their marble on the ground.The other person tries to hit it from about 6 metres away by rolling it along the ground.If they miss the first person tries to hit it in a similar way.Whoever hits it,wins the opponents marble. Hopscotch is another popular game. Conkers is quite popular that is, horse chestnut fruits on strings. Rounders is really popular and everybody loves to play it. There are lots of games that you can play with a skipping rope and quite a few people play them.
